Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.mediamanagement.mediatypes.series

Class Season

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.mediamanagement.mediatypes.series.Season
public class Season
extends java.lang.Object
Season

This class represents a season of a series and contains information of the episodes, the season title and the season Number

    • addNewEpisode

      public boolean addNewEpisode​(java.lang.String name, java.time.LocalDate publicationDate, java.lang.String shortDescription, Genre genre, int episodeNumber, java.util.List<Person> guestStars, int length)

      Adds new Episode to the current season

      Parameters:
      name - name of the episode
      publicationDate - date when the episode first aired
      shortDescription - short description of the episode
      genre - main genre of the episode
      episodeNumber - number of the episode
      guestStars - guest stars that appear in the epsiode
      length - length of the episode in minutes
      Returns:
      true, if the episode has been added successfully, otherwise false

    • removeEpisode

      public boolean removeEpisode​(Episode episode)

      removes the given episode, if it is within the episodes list

      Parameters:
      episode - The episode that should be searched
      Returns:
      true, if the episode has been found, otherwise false

    • checkIfEpisodeExists

      public boolean checkIfEpisodeExists​(Episode episode)

      checks if the season already constains another episode that matches the given episode

      Parameters:
      episode - Episode that should be searched within the season
      Returns:
      true, if an episode with the same episode number exists or, if the episode matches another episode

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Season season)

      Checks if two seasons are equal. Two Seasons are equal, if they have the same number and are within the same series

      Parameters:
      season - The object that should be compared to the season
      Returns:
      true, if the seasons are equal, otherwise false
